items.content_html: A simple text case conversion app built with Vite and React. Easily convert text to lowercase and other format with this lightweight and intuitive web application. Perfect for developers and writers who need a quick tool for transforming text to lowercase and other format

Easily convert text to lowercase and other format with this lightweight and intuitive web application. Perfect for developers and writers who need a quick tool for transforming text to lowercase and other format

items.content_html: Halyk Bank Inventory Backend platform a rapid Django REST Framework solution for efficient inventory management. Developed in under 3 hours during the Halyk OIY Hackathon 2023. Key Features: OAuth Security, User-Friendly Interface, Full Logging, High Optimization, Lightweight Database, Multi-Format Serialization

Developed in under 3 hours during the Halyk OIY Hackathon 2023.
